votifier.title: Votifier Tester
votifier.h2: Test if your server's votifier is working by just filling out the information below
votifier.whatA: Votifier Tester helps you determine if the Votifier plugin has been correctly installed in your Minecraft server.
votifier.whatVotifierA: Votifier is a Minecraft server voting plugin you can install to get notified whenever a player votes for your server on a server list, like Crafty.
votifier.whyA: Votifier is used by server owners / admins to reward players who vote for their Minecraft server. Voting helps the server get a better ranking on server lists.

ping.title: Get Server Information
ping.paragraph: Fill out the require fields to get basic information about a Minecraft server such as their status, how many players are currently online, version running and location of the server
